testsuite.name: jdk7::install7 RedHat with other default on operatingsystem RedHat

testcase.name: jdk7::install7 RedHat with other default on operatingsystem RedHat should contain Exec[create /tmp/install directory] with command => "mkdir -p /tmp/install", unless => "test -d /tmp/install" and user => "root"
jdk7::install7 RedHat with other default on operatingsystem RedHat should contain File[/tmp/install] that requires Exec[create /tmp/install directory]
jdk7::install7 RedHat with other default on operatingsystem RedHat should contain File[/tmp/install/jdk-7u51-linux-i586.tar.gz] that requires File[/tmp/install]
jdk7::install7 RedHat with other default on operatingsystem RedHat should contain Jdk7::Config::Javaexec[jdkexec JDK7 7u51] that requires File[/tmp/install/jdk-7u51-linux-i586.tar.gz]
jdk7::install7 RedHat with other default on operatingsystem RedHat should contain File[/tmp/install/UnlimitedJCEPolicyJDK7.zip] that comes before File[/tmp/install/jdk-7u51-linux-i586.tar.gz]

jdk7::install7 RedHat with other default on operatingsystem RedHat should contain Exec[sleep 3 sec for urandomJavaFix jdk1.7.0_51] with command => "/bin/sleep 3", unless => "grep 'RSA keySize < 512' /usr/java/jdk1.7.0_51/jre/lib/security/java.security" and user => "root"
jdk7::install7 RedHat with other default on operatingsystem RedHat should contain Exec[set RSA keySize jdk1.7.0_51] that subscribes to Exec[sleep 3 sec for urandomJavaFix jdk1.7.0_51]
